text: Piotr Wlazło (born 3 June 1989) is a Polish professional footballer who plays for Jagiellonia Białystok. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Polish footballers Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Radomiak Radom players Category:Wisła Płock players Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:People from Radom Category:Association football midfielders
title: Piotr Wlazło
